remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过将属性添加任何 HTML 控件适配器调用方法。The method can be called by any HTML control adapter to add an attribute. 因为它是虚拟的它还可以自定义继承此方法的适配器。Because it is virtual, it also can be customized by adapters that inherit this method. 若要确定设备是否支持访问键属性，请使用属性。To determine whether a device supports an access key attribute, use the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法写入`src`， `soundstart`， `loop`， `volume`， `vibration`，和`viblength`中的属性``和``元素，如果设备支持特性。The method writes the `src`, `soundstart`, `loop`, `volume`, `vibration`, and `viblength` attributes in `` and `` elements, if the device supports the attributes. 若要确定设备是否支持访问键属性，请使用属性。To determine whether a device supports an access key attribute, use the property. 可以通过将属性添加任何 HTML 控件适配器调用此方法。This method can be called by any HTML control adapter to add the attributes. 因为它是虚拟的它还可以自定义继承此方法的适配器。Because it is virtual, it also can be customized by adapters that inherit this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 和 WML 适配器集支持调用的概念*辅助 UI*。The HTML and WML adapter sets support a concept called *secondary UI*. 需要与基于 Windows 的应用程序，显示对话框相同的方式显示的 UI 中，附加屏幕的控件使用辅助用户界面。Secondary UI is used by controls that need to show additional screens of UI, in the same way that a Windows-based application shows dialog boxes. 有关辅助用户界面的详细信息，请参阅[适配器集功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/903adf84-e45c-407e-8b55-98796c084ff7)文档。For more information about secondary user interfaces, see the [Adapter Sets Functionality](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/903adf84-e45c-407e-8b55-98796c084ff7) documentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性类以确定是否生成标记中需要的窗体标记。This property is used by the class to determine whether the form tag is needed in the resulting markup. 目前，只有 cHTML 适配器上的设置都被识别。Currently, only the settings on cHTML adapters are recognized. 但是，此属性可用于在你的适配器中提供自己的呈现。However, you can use this property to provide your own rendering in your adapters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 和 WML 适配器集支持调用的概念*辅助 UI*。The HTML and WML adapter sets support a concept called *secondary UI*. 需要在与基于 Windows 的应用程序中的对话框相同的方式显示的 UI 中，附加屏幕的控件使用辅助用户界面。Secondary UI is used by controls that need to show additional screens of UI, in the same way as a dialog box in a Windows-based application. 有关辅助用户界面的详细信息，请参阅[适配器集功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/903adf84-e45c-407e-8b55-98796c084ff7)。For more information about secondary user interfaces, see [Adapter Sets Functionality](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/903adf84-e45c-407e-8b55-98796c084ff7).
